creditline: Gift of Dr. Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: three horizontal light blue panels from lower band; two horizontal off-white panels form upper band; off-white tab hanging loops: one in each lower corner and twenty-six along top; top loops decorated with green embroidery thread in grids, five-point stars and rectangles crossed by diagonal lines; bottom corner loops have hourglass embroidery; off-white band has stenciled dark brown dyed design of wreath formed by large curved leaves; two pairs of small strips along seam between blue and off-white bands have length of seam unsewn between each pair of strips
title: Temple hanging (noren)
